name: sprocketbox/articulate
description: A simple lightweight drop in to replace Eloquent

suggest.sprocketbox/articulate-illuminate: Allows for Articulate to be used with Laravel
suggest.sprocketbox/articulate-respite: Allows for Articulate to be used with Respite
suggest.sprocketbox/articulate-basic: Allows for Articulate to be used with basic datasources such as arrays
suggest.sprocketbox/respite: Allows for the usage of RESTful APIs as a data source
suggest.illuminate/broadcasting: Allows for events to be broadcast
